title: Spouse's right against husband who took out money of joint bank account
question: My husband started his own account and took all the money out of Our joint account. Our Mortgage has bounced and We are overdrawn. The Car payment has not been paid. What should I do? I am a stay at home Mom.
question_tags: Child support,Bankruptcy,Joint accounts during bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Spousal debt,Marriage
answers:
He is either in debt or has a new girlfriend. You need to understand that he is beyond reasoning now. You need to see a lawyer, and move to have your support and home taken care of. Do you need child support?
You need an order from the court requiring him to pay the mortgage and other expenses.
Your state may require him to pay the expenses of your lawyer since you are not a wage earner.
